Structs/TimeoutObserver.html#/s:17Advanc.name: init(timeout:queue:)
Structs/TimeoutObserver.html#/s:17Advanc.abstract: Creates an instance of the observer with a timeout

Structs/BlockCondition.html#/s:17Advance.name: Block
Structs/BlockCondition.html#/s:17Advance.abstract: The block type which returns a Bool.

Structs/BlockCondition.html.name: BlockCondition
Structs/BlockCondition.html.abstract: A Condition which will be satisfied if the block returns ´true´.

Structs/MutualExclusivityCondition.html.name: MutualExclusivityCondition
Structs/MutualExclusivityCondition.html.abstract: A condition that defines how an operation should be added to an AdvancedOperationQueue.

Structs/NegatedCondition.html.name: NegatedCondition
Structs/NegatedCondition.html.abstract: A condition that negates the evaluation of another condition.

Structs/NoCancelledDependeciesCondition..name: NoCancelledDependeciesCondition
Structs/NoCancelledDependeciesCondition..abstract: A condition that specifies that every dependency must finish.

Structs/NoFailedDependenciesCondition.ht.name: NoFailedDependenciesCondition
Structs/NoFailedDependenciesCondition.ht.abstract: A condition that specifies that every dependency must not fail.

Structs/TimeoutObserver.html.name: TimeoutObserver
Structs/TimeoutObserver.html.abstract: An operation observer which will automatically cancels (with an error) if it doesn’t finish before a time interval is expired.

Protocols/OutputProducing.html#/s:17Adva.name: injectOutput(into:)
Protocols/OutputProducing.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Injects the operation’s output into the given operation.

Protocols/OutputProducing.html#/s:17Adva.name: injectOutput(into:transform:)
Protocols/OutputProducing.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Injects the operation’s output into the given operation.

Protocols/OperationDidProduceOperationOb.name: operation(operation:didProduce:)
Protocols/OperationDidProduceOperationOb.abstract: Invoked as an Operation produces another Operation during execution.

Protocols/OperationDidCancelObserving.ht.name: operationDidCancel(operation:withError:)
Protocols/OperationDidCancelObserving.ht.abstract: Invoked as an Operation is cancelled, along with any errors produced during execution.

Protocols/OperationWillCancelObserving.h.name: operationWillCancel(operation:withError:)
Protocols/OperationWillCancelObserving.h.abstract: Invoked as an Operation is cancelled, along with any errors produced during execution.

Protocols/OperationDidFinishObserving.ht.name: operationDidFinish(operation:withError:)
Protocols/OperationDidFinishObserving.ht.abstract: Invoked as an Operation finishes, along with any errors produced during execution.

Protocols/OperationWillFinishObserving.h.name: operationWillFinish(operation:withError:)
Protocols/OperationWillFinishObserving.h.abstract: Invoked as an Operation finishes, along with any errors produced during execution.

Protocols/OperationDidExecuteObserving.h.name: operationDidExecute(operation:)
Protocols/OperationDidExecuteObserving.h.abstract: Invoked immediately after the Operation has passed to the executing state. At this point the operation is starting its execution.

Protocols/OperationWillExecuteObserving..name: operationWillExecute(operation:)
Protocols/OperationWillExecuteObserving..abstract: Invoked immediately prior to the Operation‘s execution. At this point the operation is not yet executing.

Protocols/OperationCondition.html#/s:17A.name: mutuallyExclusiveCategories
Protocols/OperationCondition.html#/s:17A.abstract: Mutually exclusive categories to apply to the AdvancedOperation.

Protocols/OperationCondition.html#/s:17A.name: evaluate(for:completion:)
Protocols/OperationCondition.html#/s:17A.abstract: Evaluate the condition, to see if it has been satisfied or not.

Protocols/OperationCondition.html#/s:17A.name: negated
Protocols/OperationCondition.html#/s:17A.abstract: Returns a condition that negates the evaluation of the current condition.

Protocols.html#/s:17AdvancedOperation0B1.name: OperationObservingType
Protocols.html#/s:17AdvancedOperation0B1.abstract: Types which conform to this protocol, can be attached to AdvancedOperation subclasses before they are executed or added to a queue.

Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.name: operationName
Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.abstract: Returns the AdvancedOperation name or its type if the name is nil.

Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.name: addCompletionBlock(asEndingBlock:block:)
Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.abstract: Adds a completion block to be executed after the Operation enters the finished state.

Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.name: injectionCancelled(message:)
Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.abstract: Creates an error usable when an operation has been cancelled due to an injection error.

Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.name: executionCancelled(message:userInfo:)
Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.abstract: Creates an error usable when an operation has been cancelled due to an error.

Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.name: executionFinished(message:userInfo:)
Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.abstract: Creates an error usable when an operation has been finished with an error.

Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.name: conditionFailed(message:userInfo:)
Extensions/NSError.html#/s:So7NSErrorC17.abstract: Creates an error usable when a condition has failed.

Enums/ExclusivityCategory.html#/s:17Adva.name: cancel(identifier:)
Enums/ExclusivityCategory.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: If there is already an operation with the same identifier, the new one will be cancelled.

Enums/ExclusivityCategory.html#/s:17Adva.name: enqueue(identifier:)
Enums/ExclusivityCategory.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: If there is already an operation with the same identifier, the new one will be added as a dependency of the oldest one.

Enums/ExclusivityCategory.html.name: ExclusivityCategory
Enums/ExclusivityCategory.html.abstract: Defines categories to be used inside a MutualExclusivityCondition.

Classes/GroupOperation.html#/s:17Advance.name: cancel(error:)
Classes/GroupOperation.html#/s:17Advance.abstract: Advises the GroupOperation object that it should stop executing its tasks.

Classes/GroupOperation.html#/s:17Advance.name: maxConcurrentOperationCount
Classes/GroupOperation.html#/s:17Advance.abstract: The maximum number of queued operations that can execute at the same time.

Classes/GroupOperation.html#/c:@M@Advanc.name: qualityOfService
Classes/GroupOperation.html#/c:@M@Advanc.abstract: This property specifies the service level applied to operation objects added to the GroupOperation. (Defaults to default quality.)

Classes/AdvancedBlockOperation.html#/s:1.name: OperationBlock
Classes/AdvancedBlockOperation.html#/s:1.abstract: A closure type that takes a closure as its parameter.

Classes/UIBackgroundObserver.html#/s:17A.name: taskIdentifier
Classes/UIBackgroundObserver.html#/s:17A.abstract: A unique token that identifies a request to run in the background.

Classes/ExclusivityManager.html#/s:17Adv.name: shared
Classes/ExclusivityManager.html#/s:17Adv.abstract: A shared ExclusivityManager instance (per-process) that can be used accross multiple AdvanceOperations.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: exclusivityManager
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: ExclusivityManager used to evaluated mutually exclusiveness for an AdvancedOperation.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: error
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Error generated during the execution.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: conditions
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Conditions evaluated before executing the operation.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: observers
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Observers listinening to changes.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: log
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: An instance of OSLog (by default is disabled).

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: hasError
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Returns true if the AdvancedOperation has generated an error during its lifetime.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationQueue
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: You can use this method from within the running operation object to get a reference to the operation queue that started it.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: execute()
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: cancel(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: finish(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Finishes the operation.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: addCondition(_:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationWillStartEvaluatingConditions()
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation will start evaluating conditions.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationDidFinishEvaluatingConditions(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation has finished evaluating conditions.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationWillRequestMutualExclusiveness()
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation will request mutual exclusivenesss.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationIsWaitingForMutualExclusiveness()
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation is waiting until the mutual exclusiveness request has been fulfilled.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationDidFinishRequestingMutualExclusiveness(success:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation has finished requesting mutual exclusivenesss.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationWillExecute()
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation will start executing.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationDidProduceOperation(_:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation has produced another Operation.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationWillCancel(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation will be cancelled.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationDidCancel(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation has been cancelled.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationWillFinish(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation will finish its execution.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: operationDidFinish(error:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Subclass this method to know when the operation has finished executing.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: duration
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: The AdvancedOperation duration in seconds.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: addObserver(_:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: Add an observer to the to the operation, can only be done prior to the operation starting.

Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.name: continueToRunInBackground(application:)
Classes/AdvancedOperation.html#/s:17Adva.abstract: The operation continues to run, for a period of time, after the app transitions to the background.

Classes/BlockObserver.html.name: BlockObserver
Classes/BlockObserver.html.abstract: The BlockObserver is a way to attach arbitrary blocks to significant events in an Operation‘s lifecycle.

Classes/UIBackgroundObserver.html.name: UIBackgroundObserver
Classes/UIBackgroundObserver.html.abstract: An UIBackgroundObserver instance lets an AdvancedOperation run for a period of time after the app transitions to the background.

Classes/AdvancedBlockOperation.html.name: AdvancedBlockOperation
Classes/AdvancedBlockOperation.html.abstract: A concurrent sublcass of AdvancedOperation to execute a closure.

Classes/DelayOperation.html.name: DelayOperation
Classes/DelayOperation.html.abstract: An AdvancedOperation that will simply wait for a given time interval, or until a specific Date.

Classes/GroupOperation.html.name: GroupOperation
Classes/GroupOperation.html.abstract: An AdvancedOperation subclass which enables a finite grouping of other operations.
